<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Gnome Weapon Familiarity](/Feats.aspx?ID=30) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gnome" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=80" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 44 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You favor unusual weapons tied to your people, such as blades with curved and peculiar shapes. You are trained with the [glaive](/Weapons.aspx?ID=20) and [kukri](/Weapons.aspx?ID=56).

 In addition, you gain access to kukris and all uncommon [gnome](/Traits.aspx?ID=80) weapons. For the purpose of determining your proficiency, martial gnome weapons are simple weapons and advanced gnome weapons are martial weapons.

<title level="2">Gnome Weapon Familiarity leads to...</title>
[Gnome Weapon Expertise](/Feats.aspx?ID=37), [Gnome Weapon Innovator](/Feats.aspx?ID=34)
name: Gnome Weapon Familiarity
